mapper.update: UPDATE FoodReply SET replyText = #{replyText}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FoodReply (boardId, userId, replyText) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{replyText})
mapper.select: SELECT fr.id, fr.boardId, fr.replyText, fr.inserted, fr.updated, fr.userId, u.name FROM FoodReply fr JOIN User u ON fr.userId = u.id WHERE fr.boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY id DESC;
